Title: Kiki to Lala no Ohimesama ni Naritai
Description: ['Kiki and Lala are preparing for Hoshi Matsuri and dreaming of all the fun things they can wish for themselves if they spot a falling star.']
Staff: [['Hata, Masami', 'Director'], ['Arisawa, Takanori', 'Music'], ['Matsuda, Akihiko', 'Sound Effects'], ['Kaneshima, Kunio', 'Background Art']]
